original_text: You heard me say to you, ‘I am going away, and I will come to you.’ If you loved me, you would have rejoiced, because I am going to the Father, for the Father is greater than I.
korean_text: 내가 갔다가 너희에게로 온다 하는 말을 너희가 들었나니 나를 사랑하였더라면 내가 아버지께로 감을 기뻐하였으리라 아버지는 나보다 크심이라

sentences.original_text: You heard me say to you,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 내가 너희에게 말한 것을 들었으니

sentences.original_text: and I will come to you.'
because I am going to the Father,
for the Father is greater than I.
